scripts.build: npm run train && cp chatbot/app.js chatbot/build/index.js && npx webpack build chatbot/test/webpack.js
scripts.testWebpack: npm run build && cp chatbot/build/index.js chatbot/test/chatbot.js && cp chatbot/build/modelString.js chatbot/test/ && npx webpack serve chatbot/test/webpack.js --static ./test --open /webpack.html --mode development
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sed -i 's/debug = true/debug = false/' build/index.js && npm publish --access public
